donate.title: Donate to the bot so it continues up and running

help.title: List of commands
help.forMoreInfo: For more information on a command, use `{0:prefix}{1:used_help_command} <command>`

source.description: I'm an open source bot, you can see my source code [here]({0:link})

password.title: Random password
password.description:
Your random password of length {0:length} is `{1:password}`
Click "Dismiss message" when you have it copied to delete it from Discord chat!

pick.title: Pick
pick.description:
Picking a random thing from _{0:list}_

My pick is **{1:pick}**

score.noMatchesLive: No live matches found right now
score.title: {0:emoji} Live matches:
score.footer: Use `{0:prefix}{1:command} <team name>` to get more info about a match
score.liveUpdates: Use `{0:prefix}follow {1:team_name}` to get live updates about this match

unfollow.notFollowingAny: You are not following any match
unfollow.notFollowingMatch: You are not following this match

follow.alreadyFollowing: You are already following this match
follow.followLimitReached: You can only follow {0:limit} matches at the same time. Use `{1:prefix}unfollow` to unfollow a match

pause.cannotPause: Cannot pause the current queue item
pause.paused: Paused! Use `{0:prefix}resume` to resume the queue

radio.cannotConnect: Cannot connect to your voice channel
radio.notInRightChannel: You are not in the same voice channel as the bot
radio.listFooter: Start a radio with `{0:prefix}{1:command} <radio name>` and `{0:prefix}stop` when you are tired of it!

play.notInRightChannel: You are not in the same voice channel as the bot
play.cannotConnect: Cannot connect to your voice channel
play.multipleResultsSelectOne: Multiple results found, please select one
play.firstResultWillPlay:
[{0:title} from {1:author}]({2:url})
Will be added to the queue in {3:time} seconds
If that's not the result you want, press the `Play other` button
play.ifYouFailToSelect: If you fail to select a result in {0:time} seconds, the first result will be selected

lyric.notConnected: Bot is not connected to a voice channel, you can pass the song name as argument
